SEARCH
Package Boundary

Class CompanyRepresentativeCLI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.AbstractCLI
Boundary.CompanyRepresentativeCLI
public class CompanyRepresentativeCLI extends AbstractCLI
Boundary class for company representative user interface. Allows company representatives to create internship opportunities (up to 5), view their opportunities' status, manage applications (approve/reject), view detailed student information, and toggle opportunity visibility. Each opportunity can have maximum 10 slots.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen

    • showInternshipDetailsWithActions

      private void showInternshipDetailsWithActions(String internshipID, String status)
      Shows internship details in a dialog with Edit and Delete buttons available. Edit and Delete buttons are only enabled if the status is "pending".
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship to view
      status - the current status (pending, approved, etc.)

    • editInternshipOpportunity

      private void editInternshipOpportunity(String internshipID)
      Opens edit dialog for internship opportunity (only allowed if pending status). Allows company rep to modify title, description, level, dates, slots, and majors.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship to edit

    • extractValue

      private String extractValue(List<String> details, String prefix)
      Helper method to extract value from a prefixed string. E.g., "Title: My Title" -> "My Title"
      Parameters:
      details - the list of detail strings to search
      prefix - the prefix to search for
      Returns:
      the value after the prefix, or empty string if not found

    • extractDateOnly

      private String extractDateOnly(String fullDate)
      Helper method to extract just the date portion (yyyy-MM-dd) from a full date string. Handles formats like "Wed Nov 12 12:34:56 PST 2025" and extracts just the date. If already in yyyy-MM-dd format, returns as is.
      Parameters:
      fullDate - the full date string from the control
      Returns:
      date in yyyy-MM-dd format, or empty string if parsing fails

    • getMonthNumber

      private String getMonthNumber(String monthName)
      Helper to convert month name to number (e.g., "Jan" -> "01")
      Parameters:
      monthName - the month name to convert
      Returns:
      the corresponding month number as a string (e.g., "01" for "Jan"), or "01" if not recognized

    • deleteInternshipOpportunity

      private void deleteInternshipOpportunity(String internshipID)
      Deletes an internship opportunity (only allowed if pending status). Similar to deleting applications - removes from CSV and in-memory list.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the internship to delete
